document_title: Bone spurs: Causes, symptoms and treatments
subsection_content: In most cases, bone spurs mainly form in the elderly, especially those 60 and older. However, because of many different causes and factors, over the years, even young people are likely to encounter this problem.
subsection_title: gai xuong.json. Subjects susceptible to disease

gai xuong.json. Subjects susceptible to disease
In most cases, bone spurs mainly form in the elderly, especially those 60 and older. However, because of many different causes and factors, over the years, even young people are likely to encounter this problem.
